document.full_text: the body of one of the 228 victims of the air france rio-paris flight that crashed into the ocean off brazil in 2009 was painstakingly lifted to the surface on thursday from a depth of 3,900 meters (12,800 feet).
document.title: rio-paris crash body lifted to surface from seabed
lines_and_colors: the body of one of the 228 victims of the air france rio-paris flight that crashed into the ocean off brazil in 2009 was painstakingly lifted to the surface on thursday from a depth of 3,900 meters (12,800 feet).
